name: Run Santa Run!!
overview: Short Game made for Christmas based on the SUECK. Based off of Halloweenie, This time you are Santa and must collect all the Presents while avoiding/dodging everything else, This is a lot easier Game as you now have a 7 hit life bar, Should be good for Kids to Play but still might be a bit hard for them, Read the Scroll Text on the Title Screen for story, Info, and Credits. Have Fun.
